map_description: The Von Neumann class Mark III point defense frigate is the latest in a line of frigates produced by solgov, based on an older decommissioned blueprint, featuring a conventional drive system, light hull, and a disproportionately large standard grade defensive armament, this ship has only one job, to de-kesslerize earth, and clear out particularly threatening asteroid fields.
strengths: Smallest ship to ever mount a Thirring drive
weaknesses: Single reactor must be pushed to see any real functionality
